text: David Matthew Kriete (born 1963) is a vice admiral in the United States Navy, who currently serves as the deputy commander of the United States Fleet Forces Command. He is a graduate of the United States Naval Academy.https://www.stratcom.mil/Media/News/News-Article- View/Article/1556716/new-york-native-receives-third-star-named-usstratcom-
